description.p: When ingested, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, they will fall unconscious after 1 min and remain unconscious for 10 min. They awaken early if they take damage or if a creature spends an action to shake or slap them awake. Creature that need no sleep are unaffected by this morsel.

sheet.description: The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On fail, they will fall unconscious after 1 min and remain unconscious for 10 min. They awaken early if they take damage or if a creature spends an action to wake them. Creature that need no sleep are unaffected. (Can be made with Order Up)

description.p: When ingested, the target gains darkvision up to a range of 60 ft for 8 hours. If target already has darkvision, its range increases by 60 ft.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target gains darkvision up to a range of 60 ft for 8 hours. If target already has darkvision, its range increases by 60 ft Can be made with Order Up).

description.p: When ingested, the target must make a Constitution saving throw against having bad breath. On fail, for 10 min, the target has disadvantage on all Charisma checks and creature cannot be charmed by the target. Any creautre already charmed by the target will have the effect suspended for the duration if the charmed creature can see the target.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On fail, for 10 min, the target has disadvantage on all Charisma checks and creature cannot be charmed by the target. Any creautre already charmed by the target will have the effect suspended for the duration if the charmed creature can see the target Can be made with Order Up).

description.p: When ingested, the target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On fail, it takes cold damage and has disadvantage on Concentration checks until the start of your next turn. On success, the creature takes half damage and doesn't have disadvantage.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On fail, it takes 1d6 cold damage and has disadvantage on Concentration checks until the start of your next turn. On success, the creature takes half damage and doesn't have disadvantage Can be made with Order Up).

When ingested, the target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On fail, it takes 2d6 cold damage and has disadvantage on Concentration checks until the start of your next turn. On success, the creature takes half damage and doesn't have disadvantage Can be made with Order Up).

When ingested, the target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On fail, it takes 6d6 cold damage and has disadvantage on Concentration checks until the start of your next turn. On success, the creature takes half damage and doesn't have disadvantage Can be made with Order Up).

When ingested, the target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On fail, it takes 7d6 cold damage and has disadvantage on Concentration checks until the start of your next turn. On success, the creature takes half damage and doesn't have disadvantage Can be made with Order Up).

description.p: When ingested, the target must make a Strength saving throw. On fail, it takes bludgeoning damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of your next turn. On success, the creature takes half damage and doesn't have disadvantage.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target must make an Strength saving throw. On fail, it takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of your next turn. On success, the creature takes half damage and doesn't have disadvantage Can be made with Order Up).

When ingested, the target must make an Strength saving throw. On fail, it takes 7d6 bludgeoning damage and has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of your next turn. On success, the creature takes half damage and doesn't have disadvantage Can be made with Order Up).

description.p: When ingested, the target adds 1d4 to all Constitution saving throw, Intelligence checks, and Wisdom checks for 1 hour.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target adds 1d4 to all Constitution saving throw, Intelligence checks, and Wisdom checks for 1 hour Can be made with Order Up).

description.p: When ingested, the target gains temporary hit points for 1 min.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target gains 1d8 temporary hit points for 1 min. (Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, the target gains 2d8 temporary hit points for 1 min. (Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, the target gains 3d8 temporary hit points for 1 min. (Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, the target gains 4d8 temporary hit points for 1 min. (Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, the target gains 5d8 temporary hit points for 1 min. (Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, the target gains 6d8 temporary hit points for 1 min. (Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, the target gains 7d8 temporary hit points for 1 min. (Can be made with Order Up).

description.p: When ingested, for 1 min, the target gains a bonus to all damage rolls and ability checks made with Strength.

sheet.description: When ingested, for 1 min, the target adds 1d4 to all damage rolls and ability checks made with Strength Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, for 1 min, the target adds 1d6 to all damage rolls and ability checks made with Strength Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, for 1 min, the target adds 1d8 to all damage rolls and ability checks made with Strength Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, for 1 min, the target adds 1d10 to all damage rolls and ability checks made with Strength Can be made with Order Up).

description.p: When ingested, the target gains resistance to cold damage and immunity to the poisoned condition for 10 mins.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target gains resistance to cold damage and immunity to the poisoned condition for 10 mins Can be made with Order Up).

description.p: When ingested, the target gains resistance to fire damage and immunity to the grappled condition for 10 mins.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target gains resistance to fire damage and immunity to the grappled condition for 10 mins Can be made with Order Up).

description.p: When ingested, the target's speed increases for 10 min.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target's speed increases by 5 ft for 10 min Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, the target's speed increases by 15 ft for 10 min Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, the target's speed increases by 20 ft for 10 min Can be made with Order Up).
When ingested, the target's speed increases by 25 ft for 10 min Can be made with Order Up).

description.p: When ingested, the target gains the effect of the Jump spell for 1 hour.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target gains the effect of the Jump spell for 1 hour.

description.p: When ingested, the target gains the effect of the Water Breathing spell for 1 hour. The target also gains a swim speed equal to their movement speed for the duration.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target gains the effect of the Water Breathing spell for 1 hour. The target also gains a swim speed equal to their movement speed for the duration.

description.p: When ingested, for 10 min, when the target falls, they can choose their rate to be either 5 ft or 60 ft per round for each round they are in the air. If they land before the end of the 10 min, they take no fall damage.

sheet.description: When ingested, for 10 min, when the target falls, they can choose their rate to be either 5 ft or 60 ft per round for each round they are in the air. If they land before the end of the 10 min, they take no fall damage.

description.p: When ingested, the target gains the effect of the Spider Climb spell for 1 hour.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target gains the effect of the Spider Climb spell for 1 hour.

description.p: When ingested, the target gains the effect of the Barkskin spell for 1 hour.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target gains the effect of the Barkskin spell for 1 hour.

description.p: When ingested, for 1 min, whenever the target makes a weapon attack, they must subtract 1d6 from the damage roll.

sheet.description: When ingested, for 1 min, whenever the target makes a weapon attack, they must subtract 1d6 from the damage roll.

description.p: When ingested, the target must make a Wisdom save. On fail, the creature becomes indifferent to all other creature for 1 min. The indifference ends early if the target is damaged in any way. A creature who can't be charmed is immune to this effect.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target must make a Wisdom save. On fail, the creature becomes indifferent to all other creature for 1 min. The indifference ends early if the target is damaged in any way. A creature who can't be charmed is immune to this effect.

description.p: When ingested, the target gains the benefits of the See Invisibility spell for 1 min. The target can also use an action to enter or exit the ethereal plane.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target gains the benefits of the See Invisibility spell for 1 min. The target can also use an action to enter or exit the ethereal plane.

description.p: When ingested, the target can recover expended spell slots of a combined level up to 1d4. If the recovered spell slots are not used in the next minute, they are lost.

sheet.description: When ingested, the target can recover expended spell slots of a combined level up to 1d4. If the recovered spell slots are not used in the next minute, they are lost.

description.p: When ingested, for 1 min, add 1d6 extra damage to the first weapon attack that hits the target on each turn.

sheet.description: When ingested, for 1 min, add 1d6 extra damage to the first weapon attack that hits the target on each turn.

description.p: When ingested, for 1 min, the target gains +1 to AC, and they can use an action to do one of the following

Frightful PresenceThe target roars. Each creature of the target's choice that is within 30 ft of the target must make succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. On sucess, the creature is immune to the target's Frightful Presence for the next minute. On fail, the creature becomes frightened of the target for 1 min. The creature can repeat its saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
Tail Swipe Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft, one target. Damage: 4d8 fire
When ingested, for 1 min, the target gains +1 to AC, and they can use an action to do one of the following

Frightful PresenceThe target roars. Each creature of the target's choice that is within 30 ft of the target must make succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. On sucess, the creature is immune to the target's Frightful Presence for the next minute. On fail, the creature becomes frightened of the target for 1 min. The creature can repeat its saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
Tail Swipe Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft, one target. Damage: 4d8 fire
When ingested, the target grows a second head that vanishes after 1 min, and grants the following benefits:

ul.li: Gain 1d10 temporary hits points at the start of their turn.
Any limb amputated in the last 24 hours regenerate at the start of each of their turns.
Gain an extra reaction for only opportunity attacks.
Gain an extra action used only for Disengage, Help, or Search.

description.p: When ingested, the target grows a second head that vanishes after 1 min, and grants the following benefits:

ul.li: Gain 1d10 temporary hits points at the start of their turn.
Any limb amputated in the last 24 hours regenerate at the start of each of their turns.
Gain an extra reaction for only opportunity attacks.
Gain an extra action used only for Disengage, Help, or Search.

description.p: When ingested, for 1 min, the target gains resistance to Acid, Fire, Poison, Lightning, and Thunder damage. They also gain flying and swimming speed equal to their movement speed for the duration.

sheet.description: When ingested, for 1 min, the target gains resistance to Acid, Fire, Poison, Lightning, and Thunder damage. They also gain flying and swimming speed equal to their movement speed for the duration.

description.p: When ingested, for 1 min, the target gains a bonus to all damage rolls and ability checks they make using Dexterity.

sheet.description: When ingested, for 1 min, the target adds 1d4 to all damage rolls and ability checks they make using Dexterity.
When ingested, for 1 min, the target adds 1d6 to all damage rolls and ability checks they make using Dexterity.
When ingested, for 1 min, the target adds 1d8 to all damage rolls and ability checks they make using Dexterity.
When ingested, for 1 min, the target adds 1d10 to all damage rolls and ability checks they make using Dexterity.

description.p: Intensely fermented alcohol. When ingested, it loosens the body’s muscles. The target gains resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from weapon attacks for 1 minute.

sheet.description: The target gain resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, slashing and piercing damage for 1 minute.

description.p: A sweet and juicy fish. When ingested, it boosts the powers of the mind. The target has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma checks for 1 minute.

sheet.description: The target gain advantage to all Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma checks for 1 minute.

description.p: Roasted pine nuts smashed into a chunky cream. When ingested, it gives the target a sweet, fragrant breath. All friendly creatures within 10 feet of the target (including the target) have advantage on saving throws for 1 minute.

sheet.description: The target and all allies in a 10 ft range gain advantage to all saving throws for 1 minute.

description.p: Brussel sprouts wrapped in ham. When ingested, they power consistent and disruptive flatulence. The target gains immunity to the charmed and frightened conditions for 1 minute.

sheet.description: The target gains immunity to the charmed and frightened conditions for 1 minute.

description.p: Hearty, yet swelling food. When ingested by a Medium or smaller creature, the target grows into a much pudgier, threatening form. The target’s size doubles, and its weight is multiplied by eight for 1 minute. This growth increases its size by one category. The target also gains advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws for the duration.

sheet.description: The target grows one size and gains advantage on Strength checks and saving throws.

description.p: Coffee with an unnaturally high amount of caffeine. When ingested, it supercharges the nerves, constantly sending electrical currents through the heart. For 1 minute, if the target drops to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, the target instead drops to 1 hit point, and this morsel's effect ends.

sheet.description: If the target drops to 0 HP from damage in the next minute, it instead drops to 1 HP and this effect ends.

description.p: Complex grains suffused with healthy fats. When ingested, it builds up the skin to stand up to any assault. The target has resistance to all damage until the end of your next turn.

sheet.description: The target has resistance to all damage till the end of your next turn.

description.p: A thick, heavy, and acidic porridge. When ingested, it forces the body to use a significant amount of energy to process. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 1d6 acid damage and is considered restrained for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Constitution saving throw. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a successful save, the target takes half damage and is not restrained. The morsel's damage increases by 1d6 when you reach certain levels in this class: 4th level (2d6), 7th level (3d6), 9th level (4d6), 13th level (5d6), 17th level (6d6), and 20th level (7d6).

sheet.description: The target must roll a Constitution saving throw, on a fail the target is restrained for 1 min and takes 1d6 acid damage.
The target must roll a Constitution saving throw, on a fail the target is restrained for 1 min and takes 2d6 acid damage.
The target must roll a Constitution saving throw, on a fail the target is restrained for 1 min and takes 3d6 acid damage.
The target must roll a Constitution saving throw, on a fail the target is restrained for 1 min and takes 4d6 acid damage.
The target must roll a Constitution saving throw, on a fail the target is restrained for 1 min and takes 5d6 acid damage.
The target must roll a Constitution saving throw, on a fail the target is restrained for 1 min and takes 6d6 acid damage.
The target must roll a Constitution saving throw, on a fail the target is restrained for 1 min and takes 7d6 acid damage.

description.p: A rare and combustible spice. When ingested, it mixes with the target creature’s breath and spit to create a fiery discharge. All creatures within 15 feet of the target (including the target) must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save they take 4d6 fire damage, or half as much on a successful save. The morsel's damage increases by 1d6 when you reach certain levels in this class: 9th level (5d6), 13th level (6d6), 17th level (7d6), 20th level (8d6).

sheet.description: The target and all creature within 15 ft must roll a Dexterity save, on a fail the targets takes 4d6 fire damage or half as much on a successful save.
The target and all creature within 15 ft must roll a Dexterity save, on a fail the targets takes 5d6 fire damage or half as much on a successful save.
The target and all creature within 15 ft must roll a Dexterity save, on a fail the targets takes 6d6 fire damage or half as much on a successful save.
The target and all creature within 15 ft must roll a Dexterity save, on a fail the targets takes 7d6 fire damage or half as much on a successful save.
The target and all creature within 15 ft must roll a Dexterity save, on a fail the targets takes 8d6 fire damage or half as much on a successful save.

description.p: Festering tuna baked in over-ripened garlic. When ingested, it causes the target to exude rot from every pore. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, all hostile creatures within 10 feet of the target (including the target) have disadvantage on saving throws for 1 minute.

sheet.description: If the target fails a constitution save, the target and all hostile creatures within 10 ft of the target have disadvantage on saving throws for 1 minute.

description.p: A vegetable in the heat of decomposition. When ingested, the target sprays the vegetable’s over-ripened juices all around itself. All hostile creatures within 30 feet of the target (including the target) must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save they are paralyzed until the start of your next turn and blinded for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, a target can make another Constitution saving throw. On a success, they are no longer blinded.

sheet.description: All hostile creatures within 30 ft of the target must make a constitution save, on a fail they are paralyzed until the start of your next turn and blinded for 1 min.

description.p: A pitch black ale, foaming with shadows. When ingested, the target immediately vomits magical darkness that fills a 10- foot radius sphere centered on the target. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness and nonmagical light can't illuminate it. The darkness lasts for 1 minute. All creatures friendly to the target (including the target) can see through this magical darkness.

sheet.description: The target is surrounded by darkness in a 10 ft range for 1 min.

description.p: A white swirl of frozen vodka, misting a boozy aroma. When ingested, the target immediately vomits snow that covers the ground around them. The ground in a 15-foot radius centered on the target becomes covered with snow. The snow is considered difficult terrain for all creatures hostile to the target. When the snow is vomited, all creatures hostile to the target within in the area must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is pushed out of the snow's area, away from the target. The snow lasts for 1 minute, or until melted by an intense heat.

sheet.description: The target is surrounded by difficult terrain in a 15 ft range and hostile creatures in the area must make a Strength save or be knocked back away from the target. This lasts for 1 min.

description.p: A grey liquor, with sickly, yellow flames caressing the surface. When ingested, the target's eyes and body become wreathed in yellow-green flames for 1 minute. The flames shed dim light in a 10-foot radius, reaching out to drain the life of the target's enemies. When a large or smaller creature that is hostile to the target moves into the dim light for the first time on a turn, or starts its turn there, they must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, they suffer one level of exhaustion.

sheet.description: The target is surrounded by an aura for 1 minute, in which if hostile creatures enter and fail a constitution save they suffer one level of exhaustion.

description.p: White wine, bubbling with divine energy. When ingested, the target sheds bright light in a 30 foot radius, and dim light for an additional 30 feet for 1 minute. When a creature hostile to the target starts their turn in the bright light, they must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, they are blinded until the start of their next turn. Creatures with darkvision make this save with disadvantage.

sheet.description: The target has an aura of light for 1 minute in a range of 30 ft, any hostile creatures that starts their turn in the aura has a make a constitution save against being blinded.

description.p: The well-seasoned brains of the world’s most capable simians. Within the next 10 minutes, the target can automatically succeed on one saving throw of its choosing. The target can choose to succeed after rolling the saving throw, but before the outcome is determined.

sheet.description: The target can choose to automatically succeed a saving throw within the next 10 minutes.

description.p: The heart of a rock candy giant. For 10 minutes, if the target’s total for a Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution ability check or saving throw is less than their score for the ability being checked, they can use that score in place of the total.

sheet.description: For the next 10 minutes the target can substitute their Dexterity, Constitution or Strength ability score for a saving roll.

description.p: Bubbly pill. This Carbon dioxide infused morsel dissolves in the target’s stomach, building up pressure inside their body. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save they are poisoned and their speed is halved until the end of your next turn. Whether the save is successful or not, if the target is killed within 1 hour, it explodes. All creatures within 10 feet of the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save they take 10d6 force damage if the target was Medium sized or smaller, and 5d6 extra force damage for each size category larger than Medium, or half as much on a successful save.

sheet.description: The target must make a constitution save, on a fail the target is poisoned and speed is halved. If the target is killed in 1 hour, all creatures within 10 ft of it must make a Dexterity save and take 10d6 force damage (+5d6 for every size above medium) on a fail or half as much on a success.

description.p: Master Brew. A hard, fine liquor. When ingested, the target immediately becomes intoxicated for 10 minutes. When this intoxication ends, the target does not become hung over.

sheet.description: The target is intoxicated for 10 minutes and doesn't suffer a hang over when it ends.

description.p: A bite of one of your harvests. When prepared, choose one of the benefits listed in your Vital Harvest feature. When this morsel is ingested, the target gains the chosen benefit for 1 minute.

sheet.description: The target gains one effect from Vital Harvest for 1 minute.

description.p: A rare slice of flesh that heals allies and harms foes. When ingested by a friendly creature, the target regains 2d6 hit points. When ingested by a hostile creature, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save they take 2d6 acid damage, or half as much damage on a success. The morsel's healing and damage increase by 1d6 when you reach certain levels in this class: 7th level (3d6), 9th level (4d6), 13th level (5d6), 17th level (6d6), 20th level (7d6).

sheet.description: A friendly target heals 2d6, a hostile target makes a constitution save and takes 2d6 acid damage on a fail or half as much on a success.
A friendly target heals 3d6, a hostile target makes a constitution save and takes 3d6 acid damage on a fail or half as much on a success.
A friendly target heals 4d6, a hostile target makes a constitution save and takes 4d6 acid damage on a fail or half as much on a success.
A friendly target heals 5d6, a hostile target makes a constitution save and takes 5d6 acid damage on a fail or half as much on a success.
A friendly target heals 6d6, a hostile target makes a constitution save and takes 6d6 acid damage on a fail or half as much on a success.
A friendly target heals 7d6, a hostile target makes a constitution save and takes 7d6 acid damage on a fail or half as much on a success.
